ovdesc.p: A cross company (general) swift out listener will pick up acknowledgment message from the Swift Out Response queue , determine the company ID and store the message in this table.

desc.p: Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
Indicates the company ID for which the record is created.
2. The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
Value in 108 tag (header) of the acknowledgment message
Date and time, the acknowledgment details was read from Swift queue and stored in FT2.
